headline: The Kraft Heinz Company (KHC): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Kraft Heinz Company (KHC) on Substack by Kostadin Ristovski, ACCA. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on KHC. The Kraft Heinz Company (KHC)’s share was trading at $29.46 as of April 17th. KHC’s trailing and forward P/E were 13.04 and 10.83, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. […]
